title: health check api status and uptime
description: Verify that the /api/health endpoint returns a 200 status with a JSON response containing status as 'ok', a valid timestamp, and uptime as a number.

title: catalogue generate api image upload and job creation
description: Test the /api/catalogue/generate POST endpoint to ensure it accepts valid image files (JPEG, PNG, WEBP, HEIC), initiates a generation job, and returns a 202 status with a jobId, status, message, and estimatedTime.

title: catalogue job status retrieval
description: Verify the /api/catalogue/status/{jobId} GET endpoint returns the correct job status, progress, and generated items for a valid jobId, and returns 404 for invalid jobId.

title: catalogue item download
description: Test the /api/catalogue/download/{itemId} GET endpoint to ensure it returns the requested catalogue item as an octet-stream with a 200 status, and returns 404 if the item does not exist.

title: user catalogue jobs list pagination
description: Verify the /api/catalogue/jobs/{userId} GET endpoint returns a paginated list of catalogue generation jobs for the specified userId, supports page and limit query parameters, and returns 200 status.

title: catalogue job cancellation
description: Test the /api/catalogue/jobs/{jobId} DELETE endpoint to ensure it cancels a processing job successfully with a 200 status, and returns 404 if the jobId does not exist.

title: trend analyzer get trend data with filters
description: Verify the /api/trends GET endpoint returns trend data filtered by optional query parameters ageGroup, season, category, and timeRange, with a 200 status and correct data structure.

title: trend analyzer get detailed trend information
description: Test the /api/trends/{trendId} GET endpoint to ensure it returns detailed information for a valid trendId with a 200 status, and returns 404 for invalid trendId.

title: trend categories list retrieval
description: Verify the /api/trends/categories/list GET endpoint returns a 200 status with a JSON array of available dress categories.
